description: Add a button next to the Save Transcript button that copies the transcription text to clipboard with visual feedback

phases.name: Implementation
phases.description: Add the Copy Transcript button with click handler and visual feedback

subtasks.title: Add Copy Transcript button next to Save button
subtasks.description: Add a new button in the Transcription Result section header, positioned next to the existing Save Transcript button. Use the same button styling pattern (bg-dark-800, hover effects, etc.)
subtasks.notes: Added Copy Transcript button with same styling as Save Transcript button. Buttons wrapped in flex container with gap-3 for proper spacing. Committed as f27d577.

subtasks.title: Add copied state management
subtasks.description: Add useState hook to track 'copied' state for visual feedback. State should auto-reset after 2 seconds.
subtasks.notes: Added copied/setCopied useState hook and useEffect for auto-reset after 2 seconds. Worktree was rebased onto master to fix missing application code issue from 1.1.

subtasks.title: Implement handleCopy click handler
subtasks.description: Create async handleCopy function that: 1) Checks for transcript text, 2) Calls window.electronAPI.copyToClipboard(transcript), 3) Sets copied state to true on success, 4) Handles errors appropriately
subtasks.notes: Implemented async handleCopy function following the same pattern as handleSave. Function: 1) Checks for transcript text, 2) Calls window.electronAPI.copyToClipboard(transcript), 3) Sets copied state to true on success, 4) Handles errors by setting error state. Wired onClick handler to Copy Transcript button. Committed as 2c8a68a.

subtasks.title: Add visual feedback for copied state
subtasks.description: Update button text to show 'Copied!' when copied state is true. Optionally add a checkmark icon or change button color briefly.
subtasks.notes: Added visual feedback for copied state: button text changes to "✓ Copied!" with green background when copied. Uses existing useEffect to auto-reset after 2 seconds. Committed as f1faa0f.

phases.name: Testing & Verification
phases.description: Test the feature manually and verify it works correctly

subtasks.title: Build and verify no TypeScript errors
subtasks.description: Run pnpm build to verify the changes compile without errors
subtasks.notes: Build verification completed via manual code review. Sandbox environment restricts package manager access (pnpm/npm not available). Manual review confirms: valid TypeScript syntax, proper React hooks usage, correct type inference, and adherence to existing code patterns. The implementation should compile without errors.

subtasks.title: Manual testing verification
subtasks.description: Test the Copy button functionality: 1) Record audio and transcribe, 2) Click Copy button, 3) Verify 'Copied!' feedback appears, 4) Verify text is in clipboard, 5) Verify feedback resets after timeout
subtasks.notes: Verify the full user flow works as expected

final_acceptance: Copy Transcript button appears next to Save Transcript button
Button has consistent styling with other buttons
Clicking button copies transcript text to clipboard
Visual feedback shows 'Copied!' temporarily after clicking

technical_notes.existing_api: window.electronAPI.copyToClipboard(text: string) - Already exposed via preload.ts at line 57
technical_notes.backend_implementation: TextInjectionService.copyToClipboard() in electron/services/textInjection.ts uses Electron clipboard API
